analysis: Market analysis indicates strong upward momentum with multiple bullish confirmations. RSI at 68.01 remains in neutral territory. Money Flow Index at 62.29 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD histogram positive with bullish crossover confirmed. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 87.53 warns of overbought exhaustion.
